BEFORE: init_channels = channels if not lowres_cond else channels * 2 # in cascading diffusion, one concats the low resolution image, blurred, for conditioning the higher resolution synthesis
AFTER:
self.self_cond = self_cond

        # determine dimensions

        self.channels = channels
        self.channels_out = default(channels_out, channels)

        # (1) in cascading diffusion, one concats the low resolution image, blurred, for conditioning the higher resolution synthesis
        # (2) in self conditioning, one appends the predict x0 (x_start)
        init_channels = channels * (1 + int(lowres_cond) + int(self_cond))
